metadata.description: The series that the Philadelphia Daily News called 'one of the year's best' of 2009 returns!! What at first seemed like a simple haunting has quickly turned into a nightmare. A spirit has been unleashed and its power has been growing stronger ever since. Now Anna's visions will lead her and Braden to Philadelphia to investigate the nightmarish occurrences and a possessed boy might prove to be just the beginning of the horror that awaits the duo. The Old West meets the X-Files in this supernatural thriller only from Zenescope!
metadata.name: Salem's Daughter: The Haunting
